Doc: A type that is used for describing cash settlement of an option / non deliverable forward. It includes the currency to settle into together with the fixings required to calculate the currency amount.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type that is used for describing cash settlement of an option / non deliverable forward. It includes the currency to settle into together with the fixings required to calculate the currency amount.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.FxCashSettlement {
  # The currency in which cash settlement occurs for non-deliverable forwards and cash-settled options (non-deliverable or otherwise).
  settlementCurrency : string

  referenceCurrency : string?

  # The amount of money that the settlement will be derived from.
  notionalAmount : FpML5.confirmation.PositiveMoney?

  # Specifies the source for and timing of a fixing of an exchange rate. This is used in the agreement of non-deliverable forward trades as well as various types of FX OTC options that require observations against a particular rate. This element is optional, permitting it to be omitted where fixing details are unavailable at the point of message creation. It has multiple occurrence to support the case where fixing details must be specified for more than one currency pair e.g. on an option settled into a third currency (that is not one of the option currencies).
  fixing : FpML5.confirmation.FxFixing

  # Specifies the source for and timing of a fixing of an exchange rate. This is used in the agreement of non-deliverable forward trades as well as various types of FX OTC options that require observations against a particular rate. This element is optional, permitting it to be omitted where fixing details are unavailable at the point of message creation. It has multiple occurrence to support the case where fixing details must be specified for more than one currency pair e.g. on an option settled into a third currency (that is not one of the option currencies).
  rateSourceFixing : FpML5.confirmation.FxRateSourceFixing

  # The date on which settlement is scheduled to occur
  settlementDate : FpML5.confirmation.AdjustableDate?

}

settlementCurrency.Doc: The currency in which cash settlement occurs for non-deliverable forwards and cash-settled options (non-deliverable or otherwise).
settlementCurrency.Name: settlementCurrency

notionalAmount.Doc: The amount of money that the settlement will be derived from.
notionalAmount.Name: notionalAmount

fixing.Doc: Specifies the source for and timing of a fixing of an exchange rate. This is used in the agreement of non-deliverable forward trades as well as various types of FX OTC options that require observations against a particular rate. This element is optional, permitting it to be omitted where fixing details are unavailable at the point of message creation. It has multiple occurrence to support the case where fixing details must be specified for more than one currency pair e.g. on an option settled into a third currency (that is not one of the option currencies).
fixing.Name: fixing

rateSourceFixing.Doc: Specifies the source for and timing of a fixing of an exchange rate. This is used in the agreement of non-deliverable forward trades as well as various types of FX OTC options that require observations against a particular rate. This element is optional, permitting it to be omitted where fixing details are unavailable at the point of message creation. It has multiple occurrence to support the case where fixing details must be specified for more than one currency pair e.g. on an option settled into a third currency (that is not one of the option currencies).
rateSourceFixing.Name: rateSourceFixing

settlementDate.Doc: The date on which settlement is scheduled to occur
settlementDate.Name: settlementDate
